Instruction: Cut the honeydew melon into small cubes and place them in a large bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice and honey.
Pour the lime juice and honey mixture over the honeydew melon cubes and toss gently to coat.
Add crumbled feta cheese and chopped fresh mint leaves to the bowl.
Toss everything together until well combined.
Refrigerate the salad for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow the flavors to meld.
Serve chilled as a refreshing side dish.
